result.eng: I just said that for fun.
result.ga: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.orig: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.html: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ga: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.orig: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.html: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ponchtml: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.

result.ga: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar ais
result.orig: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar ais
result.html: Níl mé ach díreach tagtha ar aisI just came back.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé aċ díreaċ tagṫa ar aisI just came back.

result.eng: We were just talking about you.
result.ga: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.orig: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.html: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid díreaċ ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.

result.eng: It's not just the weather's fault.
result.ga: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.orig: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.html: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.
result.ponchtml: Ní hí an aimsir aṁáin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-EabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i Nua-EaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: And the bad news just kept on coming.
result.html: Agus níor stopadh den drochnuachtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.
result.ponchtml: Agus níor stopaḋ den droċnuaċtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araon
result.orig: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araon
result.html: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: Tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin Seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: Twitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.
result.ga: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíon
result.orig: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíon
result.html: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíonTwitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Níl i Twitter go bunúsaċ aċ teaċtaireaċtaí téacs don idirlíonTwitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.html: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: Tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!
